sentences.en: Fish , clam, cuttlefish, shrimp and octopus flavored with white wine and saffron.
sentences.cn: 蛤、花枝 、 虾仁 、 蟹肉、章鱼,以鱼汤、白酒与西班牙红花入味.

sentences.en: I love the flavor of cooked with saffron.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢加了番红花的米饭.

sentences.en: Ingredients: pure olive essential oil, fruit acid, saffron, chamomile, rose hip, snow lotus etc.
sentences.cn: 成份: 清纯橄榄精油 、 果酸 、 藏红花 、 洋甘菊 、 玫瑰果 、 雪莲等纯植物提取精华.

sentences.en: Ingredients: pure olive essential oil, saffron, myrrh, angelica, ossein, peach nut seed extract etc.
sentences.cn: 成份: 清纯橄榄精油 、 藏红花 、 没药 、 当归 、 骨胶原蛋白 、 桃仁萃取精华等.

sentences.en: Ingredients: pure olive essential oil, saffron, resina draconis, liquorice essence, grape seed, chamomile extract etc.
sentences.cn: 成份: 清纯橄榄精油 、 藏红花 、 血蝎 、 甘草精华 、 葡萄籽 、 洋甘菊纯露等.

sentences.en: Oh, please tell me at least have the saffron corn with jalapeno honey butter.
sentences.cn: 噢, 请告诉我至少有撒着墨西哥胡椒和蜂蜜黄油的金黄璀璨的玉米.

sentences.en: Oil, Tomato Khup , Saffron , Sugar, Alcohol, Pistachio , Fish Ton Saffrons.
sentences.cn: 采购产品涂油水, 蕃茄, 番红花, 糖, 酒精.

sentences.en: Saffron , the spice that also turns the rice a color is essential part of the dish.
sentences.cn: 藏红花是每道菜中必不可少的, 它还可以将大米变成金色.

sentences.en: Thanks to Saffron from helping contact band.
sentences.cn: 感谢藏红花,从帮助联系乐队.

sentences.en: The world's most expensive food is saffron, which sells for a whopping $ 2,000 per ounce!
sentences.cn: 世界上最贵的食物是藏红花, 它的售价高达每盎司$2000!

sentences.en: They walked past stalls selling huge sprays of crimson, saffron and cobalt flowers.
sentences.cn: 他们经过很多卖花的摊位，摊位上摆着大把大把的鲜花，有深红色的，有金黄色的，还有深蓝色的。

sentences.en: Vegetable shortening will work very well, especially almond and saffron.
sentences.cn: 植物油较好, 特别是杏仁油和藏红花油.

sentences.en: Will you please tell me the secret of your saffron sauce?
sentences.cn: 你能告诉我你的香料调味秘方 吗 ?

sentences.en: Your veil of the saffron colour makes my eyes drunk.
sentences.cn: 你橘黄色的面纱迷醉了我的双眼.

words.tran_cn: 红花；[染料] 红花染料
[植][中医]藏红花色的，橘黄色的

trans.tran_cn: [植]藏红花（色的），番红花（色的），（用于食品上色和调味的）干藏红花粉，金黄色，橘黄色
trans.tran_en: a bright yellow spice that is used in cooking to give food a special taste and colour. It is sold as a powder or in thin pieces.
